list-item.p: COVID-19 pandemic is raging worldwide and is putting health-care systems under severe strain.
The “cytokine storm” and the subsequent ARDS result from the effects of the combination of several immune-active molecules.
The “cytokine storm” is the most dangerous and potentially life-threatening event related to COVID-19.
The chemokine system is involved in the pathogenesis of severe clinical sequelae of COVID-19, similarly to SARS and MERS.
